author: Paul Rankin
method: To make the salad, mix the broad beans, red onion and chives in a bowl. Drizzle over the olive oil and lemon juice and then add the salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Toss together and then transfer to a serving plate.
ingredients: 85g/3oz podded broad beans, cooked, skins removed,  ¼ red onion, peeled and chopped,  1 tbsp chives, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ lemon, juice only,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
